message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can see you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $900000. I can do $1100000, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $950000?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I can do $1050000, which is my absolute minimum. Let's see if we can meet in the middle from here.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $975000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $1075000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Let's see if we can make a deal.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to consider $990000?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to the end of the road, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I can do $1090000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Let's see if we can make a deal.
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle one more time. Would you be willing to consider $1025000?
